Deprecated API

Contents

  • Classes

  • Deprecated Classes
    Class
    Description
    com.guardsquare.dexguard.runtime.encryption.EncryptedCordovaWebViewClient
    EncryptedCordovaWebViewClient should only be used with old Cordova releases (< Cordova 4.0). When integrating newer Cordova releases, use EncryptedSystemWebViewClient instead.
  • Deprecated Fields
    Field
    Description
    com.guardsquare.dexguard.runtime.detection.EmulatorDetector.IGNORE_TAMPER_ATTEMPTS
    com.guardsquare.dexguard.runtime.detection.RootDetector.NO_FAIL_ON_HOOKING
    Root detection will always fail if the check was tampered with.
    com.guardsquare.dexguard.runtime.detection.RootDetector.SILENT
    Root detection will always run in silent mode.
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    com.guardsquare.dexguard.runtime.detection.CertificateChecker.checkCertificate(Context, int, int, int, int)
    Use checkCertificate with SHA-256 hashes instead.
    com.guardsquare.dexguard.runtime.detection.CertificateChecker.checkCertificate(Context, int, int, int, int, int)
    Use checkCertificate with SHA-256 hashes instead.
    com.guardsquare.dexguard.runtime.detection.CertificateChecker.checkCertificate(Context, long, long)
    Use checkCertificate with SHA-256 hashes instead.
    com.guardsquare.dexguard.runtime.detection.CertificateChecker.checkCertificate(Context, long, long, int)
    Use checkCertificate with SHA-256 hashes instead.

    Use checkCertificate with SHA-256 hashes instead.
    com.guardsquare.dexguard.runtime.detection.CertificateChecker.checkCertificateInternal(Context, long, long, int, int, int)
    Use checkCertificate with SHA-256 hashes instead.
